typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Loginemail as string,
		Identifier as string,
		Firstname as string,
		Lastname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	fileSystem: 'import',
	folderPath: 'EmailCSV') ~> source2
source1, source2 lookup(Identifier == source2@Identifier,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Suche1
Suche1 split(isNull(source2@Identifier),
	!isNull(source2@Identifier),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(newinsert, update)
ConditionalSplit1@update alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> Zeileaendern1
ConditionalSplit1@newinsert alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> Zeileaendern2
Zeileaendern2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'import',
	folderPath: 'EmailCSV',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Zeileaendern1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'import',
	folderPath: 'EmailCSV',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Identifier'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
